group_1.textLeft: That's right.
I believe everything you've just said is true.

group_1.textRight: Then they really do have a purification system in @Kamihama...?

group_1.textLeft: Since it was made from Witches, you can't see it, @but it definitely exists.
The Kamihama Magical Girls use it to summon @Doppels
and avoid becoming Witches.

group_1.textRight: So, is there actually a way of stealin' somethin' like @that in the first place?

group_1.textLeft: I can't be sure, but I can think of an idea or two that could work.
Are you girls going to Kamihama City?

group_1.textRight: We are.
We have to make them pay.

group_1.textLeft: Considering how far away the city is, I don't think @that's very realistic.

group_1.textRight: We know that~

group_1.textLeft: So if you want, I can show you a way to get over @there much more easily.

group_1.textRight: You've got a cheat code...?!

group_1.textLeft: In return, I want you to stop attacking me.
There's only so many of me. I'm not infinite.
I can't have every single one of me get destroyed.

group_1.textRight: ...I suppose we have no choice.
Fine. We shall call a temporary truce.
But we can discuss that later.
For now, we have something more important to ask you.

group_1.textLeft: What's that?

group_1.textRight: Did they have any ill intentions...?

group_1.textLeft: That's a hard question for me to answer, since I @have no emotions.
As far as my observations go, they just did what @they had to in order to accomplish their objective.
I doubt they gave any thought to anyone outside of their city.

group_1.textRight: Holy shit, that's even worse.

group_1.textLeft: Is it?

group_1.textRight: Yes, because that makes them the same as you.
Thank you for your answers. You may go for today.
We'll ask you some further questions later.

group_1.textLeft: I feel like you girls are taking advantage of me,
but I don't mind as long as I gain something out of it.

group_1.textRight: Huh, you're saying some scary things~
Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Be careful, though. There are other Magical Girls in Kamihama.
Girls from outside of the city, like you all.

group_1.textRight: We appreciate the warning.

group_1.narration: "Kyubey doesn't lie. That's a well-known fact."
"Which means there is only one thing to do now."

group_1.textCenter: Let me hear your thoughts, everyone!

group_1.textLeft: Well, Juri? Will you come with me?

group_1.textRight: Uh-huh... The moment you defeated Juri the Great, @she became yours.
And you've chilled out since then, so why not?
New enemies, new grudges, it all sounds worth @burnin'.

group_1.textLeft: Ao, how about you?

group_1.textRight: What~? Me~?

group_1.textLeft: You were leading quite a few younger girls. @That's a rare talent.
I believe that talent will be necessary.

group_1.textRight: I'm a huge coward, though~?

group_1.textLeft: I know...

group_1.textRight: Well, we know the truth now. Kamihama is obviously the one to blame~
And the purification system... An invincibility item...
Alright~ I'm in.

group_1.textLeft: Ranka?

group_1.textRight: I'll go wherever Juri goes.

group_1.textLeft: Sakuya?

group_1.textRight: I'll keep going with you, Yuna.

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru.

group_1.textRight: I can't believe you actually asked me.

group_1.textLeft: Heh, you're right.

group_1.textCenter: I'm not going to ask all of you individually!
If you are willing to fight by our sides,
make some noise with your weapons!
STRIKE THE STEEL WITH ALL YOUR MIGHT!

group_1.textLeft: I can hear everyone's voices.

group_1.textRight: This is gonna be a rough ride.
